name: dappening
description: code and contracts for ethtrader registry, tokens, and plugins

scripts.build-plugin: cp plugin/manifest.json plugin/popup.html plugin/popup.css plugin/icon.png out/plugin/ && browserify plugin/src/dappening.js -o out/plugin/dappening.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] && browserify plugin/src/popup.js -o out/plugin/popup.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]

author: Carl Larson <cslarson@gmail.com>
